catalog_info.title: Evolution of Plant Life in Geologic Time
catalog_info.notes: Course includes a weekly two-hour lab to be arranged. EPS 107 is also offered as OEB 107. Students may not take both for credit. Given in alternate years.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: OEB 10 or permission of instructor.
catalog_info.description: Origin, evolution, dispersal, paleoecology, and geologic history of the major groups of the plant kingdom. Laboratory study of representative groups, living and fossil.
